title: eBay Plans To Separate From PayPal
teaser: In a major reversal, eBay announced it will split its PayPal business into a separate, publicly traded company.
contentencoded:
E-commerce company eBay announced today that it will spin off its PayPal business into a separate, publicly traded company next year.

This is a victory for eBay investor Carl Icahn who has been pushing for a separation for months.

The latest move marks a big reversal, since eBay has long opposed the split.

Jason Bellini from the Wall Street Journal joins Here & Now‘s Robin Young to discuss the split.

Guest

  • Jason Bellini, video reporter and senior producer for the Wall Street Journal. He tweets @jasonbellini.
